item.title: IVECO 180 NC/NT by Antonio62 v1.53 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | March 18, 2025

IVECO 180 NC/NT by Antonio62 v1.53 ETS2

Changelog v1.53
– Updated the shader of the windowshield/windows
– Reimported the latest files to latest dates
– Clean and removed obsolete files
– Compatibility 1.53.x

Features:
– It includes both the drive and bdf versions.
– In this second version we have the body, the tarpaulin, the concrete mixer, the tank and the refrigerated truck available.
– Wide range of semi-trailers and trailers.
– Three different semi-trailers, flatbed, tarpaulin and without sides.
– All with the addition of its own loads.
– For trailers we have the tank, the box, the tarpaulin, the refrigerated trailer and the onion trailer. Both two and three aces.
– And in addition a real gem! The Ghost Trailer! This particular trailer is invisible.
– The truck also has its own customizable interior, its own sounds, abundant tuning and can also be combined with other mods.
– Templates for truck and trailer

Successfully tested on version 1.53

Credits: Antonio 62, Baltazar

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: VW Constellation Updated 1.53 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | March 18, 2025

VW Constellation Updated 1.53 ETS2

The VW Constellation Updated mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) version 1.53 introduces a modern and improved version of the Volkswagen Constellation truck to the game. Featuring high-quality textures, a fully detailed interior, realistic engine sounds, and accurate driving physics, this mod enhances the trucking experience. It includes various customization options, multiple chassis configurations, and advanced lighting effects, allowing for full personalization. Fully optimized for ETS2 1.53, this mod is perfect for Volkswagen truck enthusiasts looking for an immersive and realistic driving experience.

Credits: paulo junior

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

SCANIA R SUPER V8 1.53 ETS2

The Scania R Super V8 mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) version 1.53 introduces a powerful and highly detailed Scania truck to the game. Featuring a robust V8 engine, high-quality textures, a fully detailed interior, realistic engine sounds, and accurate driving physics, this mod enhances the trucking experience. It includes various customization options, multiple chassis configurations, and advanced lighting effects, allowing for full personalization. Fully optimized for ETS2 1.53, this mod is perfect for Scania enthusiasts looking for an immersive and high-performance driving experience.
